titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a Joint Session of Congress to receive a message from the President on the State of the Union.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 1/25/1988--Introduced. Provides for a joint session of the Congress on January 25, 1988, for a message from the President on the State of the Union.
